_comment1: The MicrosoftAppId and MicrosoftAppPassword is created from the Azure portal http://portal.azure.com when you created your Bot.
_comment2: The Luis-ApplicationId (Example format and range of characters: 'abcdef12-3456-7890-0000-000000000000') is created on https://www.luis.ai/ under your App, Settings.
_comment3: The Luis-EndpointKey (Example format and range of characters: 'abcdef12345678900000000000000000')  is created on  https://www.luis.ai/ under your Resources and Keys.
_comment4: The Luis-AzureRegion (Example : 'westus')  is set on  https://www.luis.ai/ under your Resources and Keys.
